Importing Data Cheat Sheet Python for Data Science

This document provides a comprehensive guide on how to import data in Python using popular libraries such as NumPy and pandas. It covers various topics including importing data, reading files, handling text files, and querying relational databases with pandas. The document also explains how to access data items with keys and querying relational databases.
